rukus.text: 95|1|Savgand ʙa ancir va zajtun [va ʙa Falastin sarzamini ruisi onho]
95|4|[Ki] Jaqinan, Mo insonro dar ʙehtarin surat [va ʙo fitrati pok] ofaridem
95|5|Sipas uro [ki inhirof joft] ʙa pasttarin [marohili] pasti ʙargardonidem
95|6|Magar kasone, ki imon ovardand va korhoi soista ancom dodand; pas, ʙaroi onon podose pojdor [dar pes] ast
95|7|Pas, [ej inson] ci cize ʙa'd [az in hama daloili ravsan] turo ʙa takziʙi [ruzi] cazo vo medorad
95|8|Ojo Alloh taolo ʙehtarin dovar [va hokimi mutlaq] nest
